meaningMnemonic:
The <kanji>day</kanji>'s <kanji>extent</kanji> is that we're going to do this, this, and this. That is our <vocabulary>schedule</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>itinerary</vocabulary>, so stick to it.

日程 is a relatively formal word used to talk about the schedule for a specific event, meeting, or activity.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
